name: Astor Piazzolla
description: Argentine composer and bandoneon player who revolutionized tango by incorporating elements from jazz and classical music
philosophy: I don't play tango for the tango dancers. I play tango for the musicians and the people who understand music.
quotes: The tango is not just a dance, it's a way of life
I am not against tradition, but I don't want to be a prisoner of it
Music is my language, my passport to the world
